ED_Title: Question of the Comorian island of Mayotte
ED_DecisionText: At its 99th plenary meeting, on 1 September 2023, the General Assembly decided to include the item entitled “Question of the Comorian island of Mayotte” in the draft agenda of its seventy-eighth session.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of the text of this decision will be contained in document A/77/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
